name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Volie Volume Booster Beta - All Media Sound Boost for Chrome

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control the volume of all media elements in Chrome. It is a beta version, so if any issues please do not hesitate to report it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Control the volume of all media elements in Chrome. This is a beta version; please report any issues you encounter.

Disclaimer:

This Chrome extension is provided for fun and convenience purposes. The developer is not responsible for any issues, damages, or losses that may arise from its use. By downloading and using this extension, you agree to do so at your own risk.

You are free to download, use, and delete the extension as you wish. The developer does not collect any personal data and does not assume any liability for any consequences resulting from the use of this extension. Please report any issues encountered during use, as this is a beta version.
